I1.name: Frost Shot
description: {{sbc|Innate - Frost Shot:}} '''Ashe's''' {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} and abilities apply ''Frost'' to enemies, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by {{pp|key=%|20 to 30}} for 2 seconds. Basic attacks against enemies with ''Frost'' deal 110% {{as|(+ {{critical damage|75|100}} of critical strike chance)|critical chance}} modified damage.

{{sbc|Innate - Critical Slow:}} '''Ashe's''' {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal no extra damage, instead they double ''Frost's'' slow strength to {{pp|key=%|20*2 to 30*2}}, decaying over 1 second to its normal strength.
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Frost Shot: Ashe's basic attacks and abilities apply Frost to enemies, slowing them by 20% − 30% (based on level) for 2 seconds. Basic attacks against enemies with Frost deal 110% (+ (+ IE 25%) of critical strike chance) modified damage.
Innate - Critical Slow: Ashe's critical strikes deal no extra damage, instead they double Frost's slow strength to 20*2% − 30*2% (based on level), decaying over 1 second to its normal strength.

Q1.name: Ranger's Focus
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Ranger's Focus'' is inactive, '''Ashe's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} generate a [[stack]] of ''Focus'' for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1 second.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ashe''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds and augments her basic attacks to fire a flurry of five arrows.
Flurries trigger [[on-hit effect]]s only once, and each arrow deals {{as|modified physical damage}} that benefits from {{ai|Frost Shot|Ashe|Frost Shots}} and {{stil|life steal}}
''Ranger's Focus'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Ashe's''' basic attack timer.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While Ranger's Focus is inactive, Ashe's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Focus for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1 second.
Active: Ashe gains bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and augments her basic attacks to fire a flurry of five arrows.
Flurries trigger on-hit effects only once, and each arrow deals modified physical damage that benefits from Ashe's Frost Shots and Unknown value: stil / life steal
Ranger's Focus resets Ashe's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Arrow|{{as|{{ap|105/5 to 125/5}}% AD}}|Total Damage Per Flurry|{{as|{{ap|105 to 125}}% AD}}}}
Q1.notes:
* The first attack from Ranger's Focus has 6 arrows, thus dealing 20% more total damage than expected.
* ''Ranger's Focus'' first bolt deals {{tip|basic damage}} with the subsequent 4 bolts dealing a non-reactive damage type (e.g. {{tip|default damage}} or {{tip|proc damage}}). <!--One test to determine the difference is Teemo's W, but the test is hard to set-up since the first bolt removes Teemo's W.--> The entire effect is classified as a basic attack on a {{tip|script}}-level, but is considered an ability for other effects (i.e {{ai|I|Maokai}}), which is likely due to a mistaken script-level tag.
* Although ''Ranger's Focus'' has no actual cooldown, 4 stacks of focus are needed before ''Ranger's Focus'' can be reactivated. The time before being able to reactivate ''Ranger's Focus'' is {{pp|type=attack speed|1/(0.625/(1-0.05))*4;1/(0.75+0.25*(x-1))*4 for 8|0.625/(1-0.05);0.75 to 2.5|round1=3|formula=4/average attack speed. ''This is using her base attack speed as the minimum, and considering the time over the course of 4 consecutive attacks.''}} seconds.
* Each arrow from a flurry applies {{ai|Frost Shot 2|Ashe|Frost}} and the bonus damage from {{ai|Frost Shot|Ashe}} is calculated individually per arrow.
** Similarly, since a flurry is 5 instances of physical damage, {{ii|Black Cleaver}} allows her to cleave the enemy target 5 times per flurry.
** Sources of flat damage reduction such as {{cai|Tantrum|Amumu}}, {{cai|Eclipse|Leona}}, {{cai|Nimble Fighter|Fizz}}, or {{ii|Randuin's Omen}} will apply the reduction to each arrow's damage, resulting in extremely reduced damaged compared to a normal attack.
* Each additional arrow from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will also split into 5 arrows.
** The arrows are evenly distributed among secondary enemies but one enemy cannot be hit by more than 5 arrows.
** The flurry will trigger on-hit effects once to each enemy hit, but no more than 3 targets per attack.
* The flurry applies against [[structures]]. Stacks of ''Focus'' will not be granted when attacking structures.

effects.str:
• Damage Per Arrow: % AD
  • Total Damage Per Flurry: % AD

W.name: Volley
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ashe''' shoots a volley of arrows in a cone in the target direction, each dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit, and applying {{ai|Frost Shot 2|Ashe|Critical Slow}} to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit.
Enemies can intercept multiple arrows but do not take damage from any beyond the first.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ashe shoots a volley of arrows in a cone in the target direction, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, and applying Ashe's Critical Slow to enemy champions hit.
Enemies can intercept multiple arrows but do not take damage from any beyond the first.
W.notes:
* The missiles are spawned in a straight horizontal line 75 units in front of '''Ashe''', with a total width of 75/100/100/123/123 units.
** Between each missile spawn location is a distance of {{fd|12.5}} units, except for the two outermost ones at the last two ranks (which are {{fd|11.5}} units from the closest other one), and the two centermost missiles at ranks 2 and 4 (which have 20 units between them and 15 units to the next missile, respectively).
** This inconsistent behaviour of spawn locations means the angle between each missile can vary off of {{fd|4.625}}{{degrees}} slighty.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Arrows:
  • Physical Damage: (+ 100% AD)

E.name: Hawkshot
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Ashe''' periodically [[ammunition|stocks]] a charge of ''Hawkshot'', up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ashe''' sends a hawk spirit toward the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area along its path{{ft|repeatedly for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after every 100 units traveled|for effectively up-to {{fd|1.8}} seconds at any location}}and at its destination for 5 seconds.
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Ashe periodically ammunition a charge of Hawkshot, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Ashe sends a hawk spirit toward the target location, granting sight of the area along its pathand at its destination for 5 seconds.
E.notes:
* ''Hawkshot's'' recharge timer seems to start at the beginning of the game, even prior to ranking the ability, but upon actually ranking the ability, it starts with one charge and the recharge timer starts from 0.
* ''Hawkshot'' will ping enemy champions it spots if allies didn't already have vision of them, and put a 'revealed' visual effect on them for {{tt|{{fd|2.75 seconds}}|Estimated}}, but does not actually reveal the units in particular, and is removed if the champion leaves the area.
* ''Hawkshot'' will grant assist credit if a previously-unseen enemy champion is killed within 10 seconds of being revealed by the ability.
* ''Hawkshot'' will trigger upon colliding with {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} or {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or but not {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

R.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ashe''' fires a massive arrow of ice in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Cannot grant sight through terrain and can only grant sight into brush when the missile flies through that brush}} it flies through each for 1 second. The arrow shatters upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|type=distance traveled|1 to 3.5 for 15|0 to 2800|formula=1+(0.18 per 200 units). ''This is capped at 2800 units traveled.''}} seconds, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them for 1 second.
Enemies surrounding the main target are dealt 50% damage and afflicted with {{ai|Frost Shot|Ashe}}.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ashe fires a massive arrow of ice in the target direction, granting sight of the area it flies through each for 1 second. The arrow shatters upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 0 to 2800 ‒ undefined seconds, and granting sight of the area around them for 1 second.
Enemies surrounding the main target are dealt 50% damage and afflicted with Ashe's Frost Shot.

effects.str: • Secondary Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
